values: A satire is a work of art that uses humor and irony to make fun of something.
This book is a satire of what life was like in the army.
n. 讽刺，讥讽；讽刺作品；讽刺文学；（拉丁文学的）讽刺杂咏（尤指讽刺时弊的诗）
